text: Friedrich Robert Donat (18 March 1905 â€“ 9 June 1958) was an English actor.Obituary Variety, 11 June 1958. He is best known for his roles in Alfred Hitchcock's The 39 Steps (1935) and Goodbye, Mr. Chips (1939). He won the Academy Award for Best Actor in 1939. ==Notes== ==Other websites== * Category:English Academy Award winning actors Category:1905 births Category:1958 deaths Category:Deaths from cerebral thrombosis Category:Deaths from brain cancer Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English stage actors Category:Actors from London
